## Day-by-day schedule

::: {.callout-note}
## 2. Thursday 9 January
Topics[:](Daily/2025-01-09-notes.html)

- Clearing up any start-up problems   

- Math and computing notation for *MOSAIC Calculus*

Reading: *MOSAIC Calculus* [Chap 2: Notation](https://www.mosaic-web.org/MOSAIC-Calculus/Textbook/Preliminaries/02-notation.html) and [reading questions](https://dtkaplan.github.io/MC-Workbook/02-reading.html)

Assignments due: 
  - [Chap 1 Exercises](https://dtkaplan.github.io/MC-Workbook/01-exercises.html)


:::

::: {.callout-note}
## 3. Friday 10 January

Topics: Computing for calculus with R

Reading: *MOSAIC Calculus* [Chap 3 Computing with R](https://www.mosaic-web.org/MOSAIC-Calculus/Textbook/Preliminaries/03-computing.html) and [reading questions](https://dtkaplan.github.io/MC-Workbook/03-reading.html)

Assignment due: [Chapter 2 Exercises](https://dtkaplan.github.io/MC-Workbook/02-exercises.html)
:::
